attributes.action: I voted to leave the EU, but I made a terrible mistake and I want to vote again
attributes.background: The UK's EU referendum 'Leave' campaign was based on so many lies and so much misinformation that the referendum should be re-run to provide 'Leave' voters who now believe that they made a terrible mistake the opportunity to vote again - to vote to 'Remain'.

rejection.details:
If you would like there to be a second referendum, you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133753
